data: {"concept_id": "story_fundamentals", "concept_name": "Story Fundamentals", "set": "Narrative", "type": "element", "definition": "Core engine of story: desire drives action, raises stakes, invites conflict, demands decision, triggers change, and lands in outcome.", "axes": "pillar|causal_chain|visibility|scope", "axis_values": "desire|action|stakes|conflict|decision|change|outcome | weak|moderate|strong | overt|subtle | personal|interpersonal|societal|world", "source_file": "Story Fundamentals.md", "source_md5": "bad7d2b58e16052ef61b4a71374843e1", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:59:14.515094Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_sf_map", "concept_id": "story_fundamentals", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Map the pillars (desire→action→stakes→conflict→decision→change→outcome) for a scene; cite text evidence.", "expected_features": "Each pillar present; causal links explicit.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "pillar|causal_chain|visibility|scope", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Story Fundamentals.md", "source_md5": "bad7d2b58e16052ef61b4a71374843e1", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:59:14.515094Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_sf_repair", "concept_id": "story_fundamentals", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Repair a scene missing a pillar (e.g., no clear desire) with the smallest viable edit.", "expected_features": "Fix restores engine without bloat.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "pillar|causal_chain|visibility|scope", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Story Fundamentals.md", "source_md5": "bad7d2b58e16052ef61b4a71374843e1", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T20:59:14.515094Z"}
